titleStmt.title: Christ the Sts advantage both in life and death. A sermon preached at the funerall of Ms Elisabeth Coke, wife to Colonell Tho. Coke of Pebmersh, Esquire. By Thomas Burrough, preacher of the Gospel at Pebmersh in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Burroughes, Thomas, b. 1611 or 12.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. and E.M. for John Bellamy at the 3. golden Lions in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
